'Brno' (; ; ; , Brin) by population and area is the second largest city in the
Czech Republic, the largest Moravian city, and the historical capital city of
the Margraviate of Moravia. Brno is the administrative center of the South
Moravian Region where it forms a separate district Brno-City District. The city
lies at the confluence of the Svitava and Svratka rivers and has about 400,000
residents,
categories: Cities and towns in the Czech Republic
headings: Government of Brno City and the districts
